body_html:
Thank you very much. I got the appropriate result. Also, i got the correct result with the following code.

rewriter_config = rewriter_config_pb2.RewriterConfig(                      
        constant_folding=rewriter_config_pb2.RewriterConfig.OFF,           
        )                                                                  
config = tf.ConfigProto(                                                   
        graph_options=tf.GraphOptions(rewrite_options=rewriter_config)     
        ) 
sess = tf.Session(config=config)

Does adding the option slow down the program ? Will this behavior be fixed in tensorflow 1.9 (or 1.10) ?

Thank you very much. I got the appropriate result. Also, i got the correct result with the following code.
rewriter_config = rewriter_config_pb2.RewriterConfig(                      
        constant_folding=rewriter_config_pb2.RewriterConfig.OFF,           
        )                                                                  
config = tf.ConfigProto(

Does adding the option slow down the program ? Will this behavior be fixed in tensorflow 1.9 (or 1.10) ?
body:
Thank you very much. I got the appropriate result. Also, i got the correct result with the following code.
```python
rewriter_config = rewriter_config_pb2.RewriterConfig(                      
        constant_folding=rewriter_config_pb2.RewriterConfig.OFF,           
        )                                                                  
config = tf.ConfigProto(                                                   
        graph_options=tf.GraphOptions(rewrite_options=rewriter_config)     
        ) 
sess = tf.Session(config=config)                                                           
```

Does adding the option slow down the program ? Will this behavior be fixed in tensorflow 1.9 (or 1.10) ?
